name: Gears of War 3: RAAM's Shadow
description: RAAM's Shadow is the second installment of DLC for Gears of War 3. The pack was released on December 13, 2011. The pack features a three-hour campaign set before the original Gears of War, following the exploits of Zeta Squad (Michael Barrick, Minh Young Kim, Tai Kaliso, and Alicia Valera), and also contains six multiplayer character skins, one weapon skin set (Chocolate) and additional achievements worth 250 Gamerscore.
